SUMMARY: Forbes Media Editor-In-Chief Steve Forbes reacted Friday to the worse-than-expected U.S. September jobs report, which he claimed were “government-inflicted” by vaccine and other COVID-related mandates.

TITLE: NYC’s gifted and talented program to be eliminated, de Blasio says
SUMMARY: Mayor Bill de Blasio is phasing out New York City’s Gifted and Talented program, he announced Friday — bowing to critics who complain that the coveted model is racist.
